00028 void BrowseForDNSSDService::InitZeroconfSubsystem( bool FromConstructor )
00029 {
00030 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00031     // Nothing to do
00032 #else
00033 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00034     if ( FromConstructor == false )
00035     {
00036         // Free everything active in inverse order of allocation
00037         if ( AvahiBrowser != (AvahiServiceBrowser *)NULL )
00038         {
00039             avahi_service_browser_free( AvahiBrowser );
00040         }
00041
00042         if ( AvahiConnection != (AvahiClient *)NULL )
00043         {
00044             avahi_client_free(AvahiConnection);
00045         }
00046
00047         // Not done to prevent Avahi crash (better but still crash some times)
00048         // if ( AvahiPoll != (AvahiSimplePoll *)NULL )
00049         // {
00050         //              avahi_simple_poll_quit( AvahiPoll );
00051         //              avahi_simple_poll_free( AvahiPoll );
00052         //}
00053     }
00054
00055     AvahiPoll = (AvahiSimplePoll *)NULL;
00056     AvahiConnection = (AvahiClient *)NULL;
00057     AvahiBrowser = (AvahiServiceBrowser *)NULL;
00058 #endif
00059 #endif
00060 }

00062 BrowseForDNSSDService::BrowseForDNSSDService()
00063 #ifdef DEBUG_THREAD
00064     : Thread( false, "BrowseForDNSSDService" )
00065 #endif
00066 {
00067     RegType[0] = '\0';
00068     CallBack = NULL;

00071     // Init DNS-SD stuff
00072     InitZeroconfSubsystem( true );

00093 BrowseForDNSSDService::~BrowseForDNSSDService()
00094 {
00095     StopThread();
00096
00097     // Free DNS-SD stuff
00098     InitZeroconfSubsystem( false );

00101 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00102 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags,
00103     uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *fullname, const char *hosttarget, uint16_t port,
00104     uint16_t txtLen, const unsigned char *txtRecord, void *context )
00105 {
00106     if ( errorCode != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00107         return;
00108
00109     SimpleString FullName;
00110     BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)context;
00111
00112     FullName = fullname;
00113     FullName.ReplaceAll( "\\032", " " );
00114
00115     DnsSdService ServiceInfo( FullName, ntohs(port), hosttarget );
00116     ServiceInfo.Properties.ImportTXTRecord( txtLen, txtRecord );
00117
00118     // Add ServiceShortName as PeerId in a pseudo variable
00119     ServiceInfo.Properties[CommonServiceValues::GetNameForPeerIdString()] = "c/" + ServiceInfo.Name;
00120
00121     MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, flags | OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd );
00122 }
00123
00124
00125 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags,
00126     uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *serviceName, const char *replyType,
00127     const char *replyDomain, void *context )
00128 {
00129     if ( errorCode != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00130     {
00131         return;
00132     }
00133
00134     BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)context;
00135
00136     if ( flags & OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00137     {
00138         // A new service in the list, resolve it to see if it is the searched one...
00139         DNSServiceRef Ref;
00140
00141         if ( DNSServiceResolve( &Ref, 0, interfaceIndex, serviceName, replyType, replyDomain, (DNSServiceResolveReply)SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply, context ) == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00142         {
00143             DNSServiceProcessResult( Ref );
00144             DNSServiceRefDeallocate( Ref );
00145         }
00146     }
00147     else
00148     {
00149         DnsSdService ServiceInfo( serviceName, replyType, replyDomain, 1 );
00150         MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, flags );
00151     }
00152 }
00153 #else
00154 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00155 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply( AvahiServiceResolver *r,
00156     AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiIfIndex interface, AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiProtocol protocol, AvahiResolverEvent event,
00157     const char *name, const char *type, const char *domain, const char *host_name, const AvahiAddress *address,
00158     uint16_t port, AvahiStringList *txt, AvahiLookupResultFlags flags, AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED void* userdata)
00159 {
00160     if ( r == (AvahiServiceResolver *)NULL )
00161     {
00162         return;
00163     }
00164
00165     /* Called whenever a service has been resolved successfully or timed out */
00166     switch (event)
00167     {
00168         case AVAHI_RESOLVER_FAILURE:
00169             OmiscidError( "AvahiResolver Failed to resolve service '%s' of type '%s' in domain '%s': %s\n", name, type, domain, avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(avahi_service_resolver_get_client(r))));
00170             break;
00171
00172         case AVAHI_RESOLVER_FOUND:
00173             {
00174                 SimpleString FullName;
00175                 BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)userdata;
00176                 TemporaryMemoryBuffer MemForTxtRecord(8*1024);  // DNS-SD specification say that 8000 is max
00177
00178                 FullName = name;
00179                 FullName.ReplaceAll( "\\032", " " );
00180                 FullName += ".";
00181                 FullName += type;
00182                 FullName += ".";
00183                 FullName += host_name;  // empirically host_name contains .local. in case of local domain
00184                 if ( strcmp( domain, "local" ) == 0 )
00185                 {
00186                     FullName += ".";
00187                 }
00188
00189                 // Avahi port are not in network order !!!!
00190                 DnsSdService ServiceInfo( FullName, port, host_name );
00191
00192                 // Add Txt record data
00193                 size_t SizeOfTxtRecord = avahi_string_list_serialize( txt, (void*)MemForTxtRecord, (size_t)MemForTxtRecord.GetLength() );
00194                 if ( SizeOfTxtRecord > (size_t)0 )
00195                 {
00196                     ServiceInfo.Properties.ImportTXTRecord( (int)SizeOfTxtRecord, (const unsigned char*)MemForTxtRecord );
00197                     // Remove  avahi flag because it will let Omiscid thing that we need to connect to
00198                     // the service
00199                     ServiceInfo.Properties.Undefine( "org.freedesktop.Avahi.cookie" );
00200                 }
00201
00202                 // Add ServiceShortName as PeerId in a pseudo variable
00203                 ServiceInfo.Properties[CommonServiceValues::GetNameForPeerIdString()] = "c/" + ServiceInfo.Name;
00204
00205                 MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd );
00206             }
00207             break;
00208     }
00209
00210     // Free the resolver
00211     avahi_service_resolver_free(r);
00212 }
00213
00214 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply( AvahiServiceBrowser *b,
00215     AvahiIfIndex interface, AvahiProtocol protocol, AvahiBrowserEvent event, const char *name, const char *type,
00216     const char *domain, AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiLookupResultFlags flags, void* userdata)
00217 {
00218     BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)userdata;
00219
00220     if ( b == (AvahiServiceBrowser *)NULL )
00221     {
00222         return;
00223     }
00224
00225     /* Called whenever a new services becomes available on the LAN or is removed from the LAN */
00226     switch (event)
00227     {
00228         case AVAHI_BROWSER_FAILURE:
00229             OmiscidError( "AvahiBrowser %s\n", avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(avahi_service_browser_get_client(b))));
00230             avahi_simple_poll_quit(MyThis->AvahiPoll);
00231             return;
00232
00233         case AVAHI_BROWSER_NEW:
00234             /* We ignore the returned resolver object. In the callback
00235                function we free it. If the server is terminated before
00236                the callback function is called the server will free
00237                the resolver for us. */
00238
00239             if ( avahi_service_resolver_new(MyThis->AvahiConnection, interface, protocol, name, type, domain, AVAHI_PROTO_UNSPEC, (AvahiLookupFlags)0,
00240                         SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply, (void*)MyThis) == NULL )
00241             {
00242                 OmiscidError( "AvahiBrowser failed to resolve service name='%s' type='%s': %s\n", name, type, avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(MyThis->AvahiConnection)));
00243                 avahi_simple_poll_quit(MyThis->AvahiPoll);
00244             }
00245             break;
00246
00247         case AVAHI_BROWSER_REMOVE:
00248             {
00249                 DnsSdService ServiceInfo( name, type, domain, 1 );
00250                 MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, 0 );
00251             }
00252             break;
00253
00254         case AVAHI_BROWSER_ALL_FOR_NOW:
00255         case AVAHI_BROWSER_CACHE_EXHAUSTED:
00256             break;
00257     }
00258 }
00259
00260 #endif
00261 #endif
00262 
00263 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::Run()
00264 {
00265 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00266 
00267     ::timeval timeout;
00268     fd_set fds;
00269     int nReady;
00270     int MaxDesc = 0;    // Maximal descriptor for the select function
00271     DNSServiceRef Ref;
00272     SOCKET DNSSocket;
00273
00274     if ( DNSServiceBrowse(&Ref,0,0,RegType.GetStr(),"",SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply,this) != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00275     {
00276         return;
00277     }
00278
00279     DNSSocket = DNSServiceRefSockFD( Ref );
00280
00281     while(!StopPending())
00282     {
00283         // Set the fd set to an empty set
00284         FD_ZERO(&fds);
00285         FD_SET( DNSSocket, &fds );
00286
00287         // Set or reset the timeout value (select may have change it)
00288         timeout.tv_sec = 0;
00289         timeout.tv_usec = 10000;        // 10 ms
00290
00291 #ifndef WIN32
00292         MaxDesc = DNSSocket + 1;
00293 #else
00294         // On WIN32 plateform, the value is unused and remain 0
00295 #endif
00296 
00297         nReady = select(MaxDesc, &fds, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00298
00299         // If our only socket is readable...
00300         if ( nReady > 0 )
00301         {
00302             // ... process the result
00303             DNSServiceProcessResult(Ref);
00304         }
00305     }
00306
00307     DNSServiceRefDeallocate( Ref );
00308 #else
00309 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00310     AvahiPoll = avahi_simple_poll_new();
00311     if ( AvahiPoll == (AvahiSimplePoll *)NULL )
00312     {
00313         OmiscidError( "Could not create poll\n" );
00314         return;
00315     }
00316
00317     int error;
00318
00319     AvahiConnection = avahi_client_new( avahi_simple_poll_get(AvahiPoll), (AvahiClientFlags)0, NULL, (void*)this, &error );
00320     if ( AvahiConnection == (AvahiClient *)NULL )
00321     {
00322         InitZeroconfSubsystem( false );
00323         OmiscidError( "Could not create client %s\n", avahi_strerror(error) );
00324         return;
00325     }
00326
00327     // Create the service browser
00328     AvahiBrowser = avahi_service_browser_new(AvahiConnection, AVAHI_IF_UNSPEC, AVAHI_PROTO_UNSPEC, RegType.GetStr(), NULL, (AvahiLookupFlags)0, SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply, (void*)this);
00329     if ( AvahiBrowser == (AvahiServiceBrowser *)NULL )
00330     {
00331         InitZeroconfSubsystem( false );
00332         OmiscidError( "Failed to create service browser: %s\n", avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(AvahiConnection)));
00333         return;
00334     }
00335
00336     while(!StopPending())
00337     {
00338         // Call everything for avahi and go out every 10 ms
00339         if ( avahi_simple_poll_iterate( AvahiPoll, 10 ) != 0 )
00340         {
00341             // Ok, problem or quit asked, exit thread
00342             break;
00343         }
00344     }
00345 #endif
00346 #endif
00347 }
00348
00349 void BrowseForDNSSDService::Start()
00350 {
00351     if ( ! IsRunning() )
00352     {
00353         StartThread();
00354     }
00355 }
00356
00357 void BrowseForDNSSDService::CallbackClient(DnsSdService& DnsSdService, const unsigned int flags )
00358 {
00359     if ( CallBack != NULL )
00360     {
00361         CallBack( DnsSdService, flags, UserData );
00362     }
00363 }
